title: Al-Gota Food Company
about-span: Our pride is the experience of our ancestors, we are distinguished by our continuous creativity, and our motto is trust to make a name of gold in the world Nutrition .
about-p1: Therefore, the Ghouta Company was a lush tree, its first seed planted in... 1990s, starting from the packaging of local spices and condiments And imported, and these plants grew and expanded by supporting our work in producing dryers Natural materials such as molokhiya, okra and other natural materials are relied upon Based on the experience of our ancestors and medical advice, drying natural materials is the best method It is the healthiest and safest in the world of nutrition.This company grew by producing herbs 100% medical, free of chemicals, and various mixtures such as our mixture Falafel, raw kibbeh mixture, crispy mixture, and various chicken mixtures are an addition To Levantine dishes such as freekeh, kabsa and kishk. Then we expanded We worked through the production of various jams, cakes, sweets and sweets And tahini, and we are distinguished by many types of liquid and solid molasses (pomegranate molasses). (dates, raisins), dried fruits, pickles.
about-p2: Therefore, the Ghouta Company was a lush tree, its first seed planted in... 1990s, starting from the packaging of local spices and condiments And imported, and these plants grew and expanded by supporting our work in producing dryers Natural materials such as molokhiya, okra and other natural materials are relied upon Based on the experience of our ancestors and medical advice, drying natural materials is the best method It is the healthiest and safest in the world of nutrition.
about-p3: Therefore, the Ghouta Company was a lush tree, its first seed planted in... 1990s, starting from the packaging of local spices and condiments And imported, and these plants grew and expanded by supporting our work in producing dryers Natural materials such as molokhiya, okra and other natural materials .
aboutUs-span2: Food Company was established in the early nineties of the last century in Eastern Ghouta of Damascus in the Arbin area, starting from the packaging of imported spices and condiments. It expanded by supporting our work in the production of natural dried fruits such as molokhiya and okra... relying on the experience of our ancestors and the advice of medicine.
aboutUs-span4: constantly aims to enhance its exports in local markets, move towards global markets, and introduce its products by participating in international exhibitions related to the company’s products, so that the name of Al-Ghouta Company is associated with quality and excellence, so that we can reach the required level of ambition and exceed the desired desires.
